name: Order of the Mutant
description: Alchemical savants who modify their blood with unstable mutagens to adapt to any foe.

3.name: Mutagencraft
3.description: Master mutagen formulas and concoct mutagens that grant benefits with side effects until your next rest.

7.name: Strange Metabolism
7.description: Gain immunity to poison damage and the poisoned condition, and once per long rest ignore a mutagen's side effect for 1 minute.

11.name: Brand of Axiom
11.description: Brand dispels illusions and invisibility, prevents shapechanging, and can revert a creature to its true form.

15.name: Blood Curse of Corrosion
15.description: You gain the Blood Curse of Corrosion, which doesn't count against your blood curses known.

18.name: Exalted Mutation
18.description: As a bonus action, replace an active mutagen with another you know a number of times per long rest equal to your Hemocraft modifier.
